content: Manh Hung Nguyen's homepageSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationManh Hung NguyenContact Address:Faculty of Computer Science,The Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technologies,Km10, Nguyen Trai, Ha Dong, Ha Noi, VietnamEmail:mhnguyen at ptit.edu.vnnmh.nguyenmanhhung at gmail.com I received: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology at The Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technologies (PTIT) in 2004M.Sc. in Computer Science at the Institut Francophone International (IFI) in 2007Ph.D in Computer Science at the University of Toulouse III Paul Sabatier, France, in 2010. I am currently working as:The Head of Software Engineering department, at the Faculty of Information Technology, at The Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technologies (PTIT), Hanoi, Vietnam.My domains of interest are: Artificial Intelligence Intelligent computing system based on Multi-agents systemModeling and simulation of complex systemMachine learning Web mining on user & user behavior in social networksGoogle SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
